hero.title: Train Smarter. Get Stronger.
hero.subtitle: Personalized workouts, real motivation ‚Äî results you can see in weeks.

services.title: Personalized
services.subtitle: Choose the service that best fits your fitness needs and goals.

personal.title: Personal Training
personal.description: Personalized workouts for your goals, with constant monitoring and adjustments for maximum results.

nutrition.title: Personalized Nutrition
nutrition.description: Nutrition plan adapted to your metabolic needs and food preferences, for sustainable results.

online.title: Online Training
online.description: Efficient remote workouts with all the benefits of a personal trainer, but with more flexibility.

transformation.title: Transformation Program
transformation.description: Complete 12-week program for total body and eating habits transformation.

about.title: About
about.subtitle: My passion is helping people reach their maximum potential through fitness and personalized nutrition.
about.intro1: I'm Sabina Meru»õƒÉ, founder of SMfit and internationally certified personal trainer (Level 4 and Level 2) with over 2 years of experience in transforming my clients' bodies and lives.
about.intro2: I believe every person deserves a unique, personalized approach built on solid training and nutrition principles, continuously adapted to achieve the best results. My goal is to support you on your journey to a healthier, stronger, and more confident version of yourself.
about.philosophyIntro: My philosophy is based on several fundamental principles:

personalization.title: Personalization
personalization.description: Each person is unique, with different needs, limitations, and goals. That's why all my programs are 100% personalized for each individual client.

scientific.title: Scientific Approach
scientific.description: I base my methods on current scientific research and proven methods, not on passing trends or "miracle solutions". Efficiency and safety are priorities.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.description: I believe in sustainable changes, not temporary solutions. My goal is to help you develop long-term healthy habits, not just get quick results that don't last.

education.title: Education
education.description: Beyond workouts and nutrition plans, I aim to educate you about your body and help you understand why we do certain exercises or make certain food choices.

testimonials.title: What Our
testimonials.subtitle: Real results and experiences from people who have transformed their lives with SMfit.

cta.title: Want to be the next
cta.subtitle: Schedule a free consultation to discuss your goals and find out how SMfit can help you achieve them.

items.name: Andreea F.
items.content: After the first sessions with Sabina, I was impressed by how she transformed workouts into motivating experiences that pushed me to exceed my limits. Her professionalism and energy, combined with a balanced approach (rigorous yet full of humor), led to visible results. Sabina is not just an exceptional trainer, but also an inspiring person, essential to my progress!

items.name: Ban Cristina
items.content: Despite being young, Sabina has demonstrated exceptional professionalism and commitment in working with clients. By adapting exercises to individual needs (with visible results in targeted areas) and a flexible program organized around clients' availability, she combines seriousness with an empathetic approach. Her punctuality and dedication are clear examples of maturity and passion for her profession. Maintaining this approach will undoubtedly keep her as a role model in the field! üí™‚ú®

items.name: Pruna Maria
items.content: Sabina's workouts are not only dynamic and engaging, but also extremely effective, with results being consistently visible. Through adapting exercises to individual goals and her energetic approach, clients achieve clear progress, even in specific areas. Her professionalism and dedication transform each session into a valuable investment in health and fitness. üí™

items.name: Graur Anca
items.content: Sabina is an extraordinary person ‚Äì since starting workouts with her, my motivation for sports has grown visibly and consistently. She managed to genuinely convey how important movement is for health and well-being. Her warm and attentive approach creates an environment where each session is eagerly anticipated, without stress or pressure. Her professionalism is felt in every detail, and progress doesn't take long to appear.

items.name: Dan Patricia
items.content: Sabina stands out through her positive approach and open communication with clients, creating a motivating environment. The workouts are intelligently adapted to each person's level, avoiding overload and constantly checking comfort with weights. The meal plans she offers are personalized, with balanced portions and creative preparations, making them both effective and enjoyable. Through attention to detail and flexibility, she transforms the process into one that is sustainable and inspiring! üòä

items.name: Alexandra Maier
items.content: Sabina distinguishes herself through her exemplary attention and dedication, supported by solid expertise in the field. With patience and understanding, she adapts meal plans ‚Äì balanced and financially accessible ‚Äì to individual needs, facilitating the transition to a healthy lifestyle. Her professionalism and integrated approach confidently recommend her to people determined to achieve impressive and lasting physical transformations. üòä

items.name: Bianca Moldovan
items.content: Sabina stands out through her authentic involvement and support offered to clients, combining openness and attention to individual needs with the necessary motivation to complete exercises. Through open dialogue and adapting workouts to preferences, she ensures a pleasant and efficient experience. Her constant concern for clients' health and physical development transforms each session into a concrete step towards goals. Collaborating with her is undoubtedly a valuable and motivating synergy! üåü

items.name: Ra»õiu Briana
items.content: She is a true source of inspiration. Sabina has a rarely found patience, provides unconditional support and believes in the potential of every person she works with, even when they lose confidence in themselves. She creates an authentic connection, motivating beyond the physical ‚Äì and workouts become not just efficient, but key moments of the week. Her presence and positive energy transform the entire process into a valuable and meaningful experience.

items.name: Andreea Zece»ô
items.content: Sabina's clients appreciate her for the support and guidance offered with devotion. The workouts are described as valuable experiences, and her effort and professionalism are recognized as pillars of their success. The gratitude for her deep involvement and positive energy transmitted in each session is unanimous! ‚ù§Ô∏èü§ó
